video_prompt: Petals unfurl and shift color from deep to light. Glimmering lines pulse and weave through evolving floral shapes. Luminous droplets subtly appear, elongate, and vanish. Tiny, sparkling elements drift across the deepening background. Leaves waver, and their veins subtly emerge and recede.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A vibrant, surreal bouquet of pink, yellow, and orange tulips, illuminated by shimmering, glowing blue and white fiber optic strands and luminous droplets. Dark, indistinct background. Delicate luminescence, ethereal, dreamlike. Realistically textured leaves with visible veins. Fantastical, illuminated accents.
refined_video_prompt: Petals unfurl, their hues shifting from deep to light. Glimmering lines pulse, weaving through evolving floral forms. Luminous droplets subtly appear, elongate, then vanish. Tiny, sparkling elements drift across the background as it deepens. Leaves waver, their veins subtly emerging and receding.
